TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWorkflowInstanceManagement

summary.span: 表示一种服务协定，该协定用于定义一组允许您控制工作流实例的操作。

span.span: Represents a service contract that defines a set of operations that allow you to control workflow instances.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Abandon (Guid instanceId, string reason);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Abandon(valuetype System.Guid instanceId, string reason) cil managed
Public Sub Abandon (instanceId As Guid, reason As String)
public: void Abandon(Guid instanceId, System::String ^ reason);
abstract member Abandon : Guid * string -> unit

param.name: instanceId
param.span: 要放弃的工作流实例的 GUID 标识符。

span.span: The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to abandon.

param.name: reason
param.span: 放弃工作流实例的原因。

span.span: The reason for abandoning the workflow instance.

summary.span: 尝试放弃指定的工作流实例。

span.span: Attempts to abandon the specified workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作仅对当前加载到内存的工作流实例有效。This operation is only valid for a workflow instance that is currently loaded in memory. 如果指定的工作流实例未加载或已完成，则此操作为 no-op（不执行任何操作）。If the specified workflow instance is not loaded or has completed, this operation is a no-op. 此操作无法识别事务。This operation is not transaction aware.

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginAbandon (Guid instanceId, string reason, AsyncCallback callback, object state);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginAbandon(valuetype System.Guid instanceId, string reason, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed
Public Function BeginAbandon (instanceId As Guid, reason As String, callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginAbandon(Guid instanceId, System::String ^ reason, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);
abstract member BeginAbandon : Guid * string * AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult

param.name: instanceId
param.span: 要放弃的工作流实例的 GUID 标识符。

span.span: The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to abandon.

param.name: reason
param.span: 放弃工作流实例的原因。

span.span: The reason for abandoning the workflow instance.

param.name: callback
param.span: 可接收异步操作完成通知的异步回调委托。

span.span: The asynchronous callback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.

param.name: state
param.span: 一个由应用程序指定的对象，包含与异步放弃操作相关联的状态信息。

span.span: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous abandon operation.

summary.span: 开始异步操作以放弃指定的工作流实例。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to abandon the specified workflow instance.
The .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 放弃进程会终止工作流实例、销毁所有关联的对象并释放关联的资源。The abandon process terminates the workflow instance, destroys all the associated objects, and releases the associated resources.

span.span: The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to cancel.

summary.span: 开始异步操作以取消指定的工作流实例。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to cancel the specified workflow instance.
An .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取消进程会退出工作流实例并恢复到以前的状态，而不会保存任何工作流所做的更改。The cancel process quits a workflow instance and returns to the previous state without saving any changes that the workflow may have made.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Cancel (Guid instanceId);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Cancel(valuetype System.Guid instanceId) cil managed
Public Sub Cancel (instanceId As Guid)
public: void Cancel(Guid instanceId);
abstract member Cancel : Guid -> unit

param.name: instanceId
param.span: 要取消的工作流实例的 GUID 标识符。

span.span: The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to cancel.

summary.span: 取消指定的工作流实例。

span.span: Cancels the specified workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果内存中不存在由实例 ID 标识的实例，系统会试图从实例存储区中加载实例（如果已启用永久性）。If the instance identified by the instance ID does not exist in-memory, an attempt is made to load the instance from the instance store (if persistence has been enabled). 如果尚未启用永久性或该实例未保留，将向调用方返回一个错误。If persistence has not been enabled or the instance was not persisted a fault is returned to the caller. 已加载或标识内存中的实例后，此操作将取消工作流实例。Once the in-memory instance has been loaded or identified, this operation cancels the workflow instance.
